/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a canopy of shade over the sidewalk. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil setting. On the left side of the street, a lamppost stands tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and urban life, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of the two in Beijing.
